channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.19 (Build 20260115.2)
item.description:
What's New

Improve Notion Code Block handling and debug logging

  • Detect Notion Code Blocks via AXDOMClassList (notranslate class) instead of Window Title Rule
  • Use higher injection delays (20ms, 50ms, 15ms) and oneByOne text mode for code blocks
  • Add macOS version info to debug log header
  • Fix input method labels: rename Simple Telex to Simple Telex 1, add Simple Telex 2
  • Bump build version to 20260115.1

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
